name: gl02_glo_goat
description: # Sujet A - Teaching Room Occupancy Management System ##### _✨Antoine MALIDOR, Guillaume ROZAND, Mathias NOTTER et Mathis RESLINGER✨_   ### This subject is about the room occupancy system in the Sealand Republic University ##### The university specification are : - Search for Rooms by Course - Maximum Room Capacity - Room Availability - List of Available Rooms for a Given Time Slot - iCalendar (RFC 5545) File Generation - Data Quality Verification
